name: recoshcl
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cfv(ccos, co(ci, cmul, c0)), cr))

|- wi(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cfv(ccos, co(ci, cmul, c0)), cr))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cfv(ccos, co(ci, cmul, c0)), crp))

comment: The hyperbolic cosine of a real number is real. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Apr-2015.)
